long_description: This oversized Outbound Camp Cot has an aluminum frame and heavy-duty cotton pad that supports up to 250 lbs. for complete comfort at the campsite or cabin. Includes a heavy-duty carry bag for easy transportation. Mesh storage pocket under cot is included for holding magazines, books and a headlamp. Closeout.
short_description: This oversized Outbound Camp Cot has an aluminum frame and heavy-duty cotton pad that supports up to 250 lbs. for complete comfort at the campsite or cabin.
